directorNameTitleFieldHint: Start typing a title, such as Dr or Professor, then choose from the list.
directorFirstNameHint: Enter the director's full first name.
directorMiddleNameHint: Enter the director's full middle name or names.
directorPreviousName: Has the director used a different name for business purposes in the last 20 years?
directorPreviousNameHint: If the director has more than one previous name, separate each name with a comma.
directorNameInsetTextTitle: What information we'll show on the public online register
directorNameInsetText: We will show the director’s full name on the public Companies House register. We will also show the director’s title and previous names, if relevant.
directorNameUpdateInsetText: We will show the director’s full name on the public Companies House register. We will also show the director’s title, if relevant.
